thread.title: CALBAYOG CITY RECOGNIZED AS HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL PEACE AND ORDER AND ANTI-DRUG COUNCILS | City Government of Calbayog
thread.title_full: CALBAYOG CITY RECOGNIZED AS HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL PEACE AND ORDER AND ANTI-DRUG COUNCILS | City Government of Calbayog

title: CALBAYOG CITY RECOGNIZED AS HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL PEACE AND ORDER AND ANTI-DRUG COUNCILS | City Government of Calbayog
text:
The Department of the Interior and Local Government Region VIII recognized Calbayog City, Samar as a Highly Functional Peace and Order Council and a Highly Functional Anti-Drug Abuse Council during the RAYHAK 2025 Celebration of Good Local Governance held on January 27, 2026 at the People’s Center and Library in Tacloban City.
The dual recognition affirms the city government’s effective institutional mechanisms and sustained implementation of programs aimed at maintaining peace and order, strengthening public safety, and advancing comprehensive anti-drug initiatives through strong inter-agency coordination and community participation.
This distinction underscores Calbayog City’s continued commitment to good local governance and its proactive role in fostering a safe, secure, and resilient community for its constituents.
summary: The Department of the Interior and Local Government Region VIII recognized Calbayog City, Samar as a Highly Functional Peace and Order Council and a Highly Functional Anti-Drug Abuse Council during the RAYHAK 2025 Celebration of Good Local Governance held on January 27, 2026 at the People’s Center and Library in Tacloban City. The dual recognition affirms the city government’s effective institutional mechanisms and sustained implementation of programs aimed at maintaining peace and order, strengthening public safety, and advancing comprehensive anti-drug initiatives through strong inter-agency coordination and community participation.
